Gory Bunny
collection.openText: …I still can’t understand what kind of feeling that is.

observe.desc: [ {My master was a very gentle, but also very hardworking and self-reliant female. As if she could accomplish everything easily and brilliantly no matter what she encountered. But there was only one thing that made the master look clumsy. When did my master began to dress herself up deliberately? Probably when there's a rose appeared in the vase on her bedside. It was strange. Why did my master smile so happily after the male gave her the rose? I don't know what the rose represents, but it seemed that every time my master met him, he would give her a rose. Well, appearently, he only gave her roses bucause there's nothing to give. But for whatever reason, she always seemed so delighted every time. Roses are beautiful in color, but they also look particularly rotten when they wither. I had never seen my master so devastated. She even broke the vase full of roses with her own hands, which was once her favorite thing. My master looked so sad, as if every time she breathe she was going to vomit her heart and lungs. I can't understand... I can't understand it at all. I was curious about why my master wore a white dress at first, and when the red on her chest gradually spread, the male's fearful gaze became more intense as the redness spread on her chest. "My dear! Look! Now I... am the same color as the roses~" Her smile was extremely mad, it became red and cold in my eyes, as beautiful as a painting. The blood from the fallen rose petals slowly seeped into my fur. Thicker than hatred, warmer than fear, crazier than sadness. …I still can’t understand what kind of feeling that is.} ]

specialTipSize.specialTip: Employees working on $0 will lose a small amount of HP per second.
When the work result was not Good, $0 gave the employees a "Rose" by chance. The employees who have "Rose" obtained extra Max. HP bunos.
When the work was over, if the HP of the emloyee was lower than the average rate, they would receive a "Rose".
Every time $0 gave away a "Rose", the Qliphoth Counter lowered. If the employees who were given the "Rose" died for any other reasons, the Qliphoth Counter increased.
When the Qliphoth Counter lowered to 0, the blooming of "Rose" would become more and more gorgeous.
